title: Senior Software Engineer
description: As a senior engineer on the Enterprise UI team, I’m responsible for shipping features and committing to/closing 2- week sprints. I create, close and work on new tickets; collaborate with the scrum master, product managers, backend team, UX team and QA team; and ensure quality code is delivered each sprint.

title: Lead Developer
list: Lead developer on UserId, a SaaS tool for Google Analytics User-ID reports. The technology is built on Laravel 5.4 extending the Spark library using the Stripe payment processor
Utilized previous creative development and design experience to revamp client landing pages and create internal assets used for client proposals
Introduced Flux architecture to development team to use in existing Vue application
Gained knowledge in Webflow and enhanced PHP skills using the Laravel framework
Implemented Google Analytics audits and several Google Tag Manager setups
Contributed to the sales process from lead to closing deal and delivery
Performed web integrations with Zoho, AdWords and CallRail using Google Cloud functions and custom frontend/backend integrations

title: Associate Technical Director
list: Lead and mentored a small team of developers
Researched new technologies. Introduced Node.js, React and Redux to the dev team as well as frontend unit testing in a React app with Jest
Created several client projects from start to finish providing initial documentation, structure and architecture for other devs to build from
Won many website awards for projects I contributed to and/or lead including www.pomwonderful.com and beta.wind-and-words.com
Estimated development projects, headed daily stand-ups and implemented task management through kanban
Worked on or lead projects for POM, Ubisoft, Frito Lay, and HP
Prototyped and explored new technologies and advocated for programming best practices including design patterns, paired programming and unit testing
Successfully used the XBOX connect to perform bust scans using Skanect, exporting 3D model and importing to the web using ThreeJS

title: Senior Director
list: Developed single page web applications using vanilla JS
Introduced CSS preprocessors (Less and Sass)
Performed maintenance and QA on the award winning National Geographic’s City Guides iOS application
Won many website awards for projects I contributed to and/or lead including www.pomwonderful.com and beta.wind-and-words.com

title: Intermediate Developer
list: Worked on award winning projects for Google, Viacom (Nickelodeon) and Broadway.com
Furthered skills in iOS development and built several production iOS applications
Improved in creative development including Javascript and CSS animations
Participated in on-site client meetings at Google and Apple
Contributed to multiple award winning website’s including messagesforjapan.com which was linked on Google’s homepage

title: Associate Developer
list: Worked on Flash websites (AS3) and installations for BYU, PepsiCo and Porsche
Improved in web development and learned to use jQuery
Implemented WordPress including installation and custom theme and plugin development
Prototyped iOS application for the first generation iPad
Practiced kanban, scrum and continuous integration
Implemented MVC and other OO design patterns
